item.description: WALK and LUNCH. Walk one mile to the famous 165 foot Heublein Tower in Talcott Mountain State Park in Simsbury at 11 am. At the top, we'll have a fantastic mountain-top view of four states! Hopefully, the leaves will be bright and colorful. After the walk, we'll go nearby to have lunch together. For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions: I-84 Exit 39 Farmington (Rt. 4), turn right onto Rt. 10, go about 8-9 miles to end (cross over Rt. 44), turn right onto Rt. 185, follow signs. Meet in parking lot.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in the parking lot.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Walk & Lunch
